excellent video, but badly out of sync!!!

I'm not sure how I feel about the movie overall but I'll tell you about the quality. The video wasn't bad, maybe 7.5-8/10. It could have been a little sharper but there were no parts I can remember where I just couldn't tell what I was looking at. There was also a few minor cuts where a second or two would repeat itself. The audio.. oh, the audio. I could hear it just fine, no problems there. But it was terribly out of sync. That would have been alright as I can just adjust the sync on VLC, but it kept jumping around so I would have to re-adjust the sync every now and then. I'd say it gets the job done if you want to see the movie right now, otherwise just wait for a true dvdrip.
Oh, thanks for the upload though. It is a lot better than a lot of the other stuff I tried downloading. I'm glad I finally got to watch it.
